full_summary:
**R000134935: Purchase of Office Furniture**
============================================

**Procurement Title and Information**
-----------------------------------

* **Procurement ID:** R000134935
* **Publication Date:** February 7, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 16, 2023, 2:00 p.m. (Eastern Standard Time)
* **Contact Information:**
	+ **Name:** Daivya Aneja
	+ **Email:** [Daivya.Aneja2@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:Daivya.Aneja2@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
	+ **Phone:** 343-571-4316

** Procurement Details**
-----------------------

Shared Services Canada (SSC) issues this Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) to solicit suppliers for the purchase of office furniture. The requirement falls under the General Stream of Suppliers, pursuant to the Supply Arrangement (SA) no. E60PQ-140003/C.

The procurement includes:

* **Product Category 5:** Ancillary and Lighting Products
* **Location:** National Capital Region (NCR)
* **End-User:** Shared Services Canada
* **Expected Contract Date:** TBC

The bid solicitation is open to suppliers who are:

* Pre-qualified and have a Supply Arrangement (SA) in place
* Not pre-qualified but meet the requirements outlined in RFSA # E60PQ-140003/B

Note that new suppliers must first qualify for a SA by following the process outlined in RFSA # E60PQ-140003/B.

**Important Dates and Notes**
---------------------------

* February 7, 2023: Publication date
* February 16, 2023, 2:00 p.m. (EST): Tender closing date
* March 31, 2023: Expected delivery date
* No security requirements apply to this procurement

**Attachments**
---------------

Please find the tender documents and additional information at the following URLs:

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/07/b8b1806d936e639c9a50e356c0c1b001/r134935_ws_annex_e_english.pdf, https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/14/a57e922c762cc1abac572205a719f0cb/r-134935
